query:
SELECT 
  a.id as analise_id,
  a.createdAt,
  COUNT(*) as total_relatorios,
  SUM(CASE WHEN r.lojaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_loja_id,
  SUM(CASE WHEN r.lojaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_loja_id
FROM analises_fichas_servico a
JOIN relatorios_analise_loja r ON r.analiseId = a.id
GROUP BY a.id, a.createdAt
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;

SELECT 
  a.id as analise_id,
  a.createdAt,
  COUNT(*) as total_relatorios,
  SUM(CASE WHEN r.lojaId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as com_loja_id,
  SUM(CASE WHEN r.lojaId IS NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) as sem_loja_id
FROM analises_fichas_servico a
JOIN relatorios_analise_loja r ON r.analiseId = a.id
GROUP BY a.id, a.createdAt
ORDER BY a.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 5;
